title: Pre-Rework Mayhem (Game mode idea)
body: I think it'd be cool if you guys could bring back all the pre-reworked champions (if files still exist somewhere), and create a game mode with those pre-reworked champions, maybe some extra rules or some fun passives or something. {{champion:119}}  I think that would be a new fun game mode that should be added, unless unfortunately the files dont exist anymore  {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
